input.sentences: we went to the beach today . no one was there | which was nice .
here is a photo of the waves . look at the beautiful colors in the water .
the light house is isolated here . it is not near the pier or where beach goers usually sit .
do n't worry | i did not put [male] in the water ! this is actually a sculpture that stays on the beach .
i did find some little friends while on my walk . these guys look like they are guarding their turf !
output.sentences: It was a nice day to go to the beach.
The waves were so pretty with the light reflecting on the water that I took a photo.
I decided to sit on the pier and watch the light house.
I was a little worried that the water would not stay and would come up to me at the pier.
So I decided to take a walk a long the turf and look at these little crabby guys.
